MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL14 postcode area of Wrexham, affecting properties in Bronwylfa Road and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of unexpected issues connecting the generator to the substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:10AM on 12th February 2021
